data.actual_result: you only see whichever shard's game status was loaded first
data.expected_result: you see a different status in the member list of servers that belong to different shards
data.short_description: iOS client doesn't respect per shard game statuses
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a bot on two different shards. Set a different playing status for each shard.- FULLY close out of all running instances of Discord. (Go to task manager on computer, etc.)- Open Discord, then open the bot's profile FROM a server on shard #1. Observe the game. When you go to a server on shard #2, the bot's game is still the same.
